```{r message=F, echo=F}
library( dplyr )
library( ggplot2 )
library( tidyverse )
library( gridExtra )
```



```{r}
url <- 'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmilodonCub/DATA621/master/deValoisDeValois_dat.csv'
spectral_tuning <- read.csv( url )
glimpse( spectral_tuning )
```

```{r}
rad_lab <- split( spectral_tuning,f = spectral_tuning$cell_type )
p1 <- ggplot( data = rad_lab$GR_cell, aes( x = wavelength, y = firing_rate, col = factor( radiance ) ) ) +
  geom_point( size = 3) +
  facet_wrap( ~ cell_type ) +
  theme_classic() +
  ylab( "mean firing rate (spikes/sec)") +
  labs(color='Radiance') 
p2 <- p1 %+% rad_lab$YB_cell
grid.arrange( p1, p2, ncol = 2 )
```
